title: Tavern Restaurant
description: It is our pleasure to host you in the beautiful halls of Tavern Yerevan restaurant where you will appear in an unmatched environment
offering an excellent combination of price, quality and service. The menu of the restaurant includes a number of dishes, some of which have endured for
cuisine that will feature forgotten or almost forgotten dishes. We have also included the best samples of the
Caucasian cuisine that are suitable to our customers’ taste, but are also unique and somewhat different.

title: Livingston
description: The “Livingston” restaurant was opened on October 4,
2019 and is located on the 9th floor of one of the architectural
symbols of Yerevan, built in 1986, the Sports and Concert Complex after K. Demirchyan.
A magnificent panorama of the sunny capital of Yerevan opens from the balconies of the restaurant.
The “Livingston” restaurant's name and concept were inspired by the building architecture which evoked associations with the opening of a bird's wings during the soaring,
and the view of the sky from the balconies.
